attributes.action: It should made available and free supplies of sanitary towels to young women
attributes.additional_details: It will benefit young girls affected by this hard times living on poverty and in less fortunate families. It will improve their mental health, mood swings, boost their confidence and self esteem, they will be less worried on their period and more concentrated on their school attendance. Because is a right thing to do and only the Government has the power to help like that.
attributes.background: To make it official and available free supplies of sanitary towels at all establishments such as pharmacies, off licenses, supermarkets, medical centre and community centre
